name: Chicken's Breakout
description:
Description :-

Chicken’s breakout is based on the concept of Breakout mixed with Space invaders. Core mechanic of the game is to break all the bricks by using the ball provided in the game, player will have up to 3 lives to complete the level, but the catch is player will be invaded by flying chickens who can shoot projectile towards the player, they must use shooting mechanic and kill all the chickens until all the bricks are gone. 

Controls : -

  • A-Move Left
  • D- Move Right 
  • Space - Shoot projectile \ ball

Team members :-

  • Arjun Kapoor - Game Programmer/Designer
  • Arnav Sanghavi - Game Programmer/Designer
  • Maahi Likhari  - Game Designer/Artist
